description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. The premise of Filler is simple: fill 2/3 of the screen to advance. Play Filler alone or with up to four players on the same screen. Go for a high score or try to beat all 40 challenges!
